result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.orig: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.html: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa GhaeltachtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart go mbeaḋ Gaeilge ṁaiṫ ag an té a ċaiṫ an oiread sin ama sa ĠaeltaċtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.orig: Ba chóir go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.html: Ba chóir go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa GhaeltachtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir go mbeaḋ Gaeilge ṁaiṫ ag an té a ċaiṫ an oiread sin ama sa ĠaeltaċtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.eng: I think you're spending too much time in the pub.
result.ga: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairne
result.orig: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairne
result.html: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairneI think you're spending too much time in the pub.
result.ponchtml: Ceapaim go ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ barraíoċt ama sa teaċ táḃairneI think you're spending too much time in the pub.

result.eng: He had many jobs during that time.
result.ga: Is iomaí post a bhí aige i rith an ama
result.orig: Is iomaí post a bhí aige i rith an ama
result.html: Is iomaí post a bhí aige i rith an amaHe had many jobs during that time.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí post a ḃí aige i riṫ an amaHe had many jobs during that time.

result.ga: Ní raibh mé ach ag meilt ama
result.orig: Ní raibh mé ach ag meilt ama
result.html: Ní raibh mé ach ag meilt amaI was only killing time.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ mé aċ ag meilt amaI was only killing time.

result.eng: We do not have enough time.
result.html: Níl go leor ama againnWe do not have enough time.
result.ponchtml: Níl go leor ama againnWe do not have enough time.

result.html: Níl mórán ama agamI don't have much time.
result.ponchtml: Níl mórán ama agamI don't have much time.

result.eng: They overcame the limitations of time and space.
result.ga: Sháraigh siad laincisí an ama agus an spáis
result.orig: Sháraigh siad laincisí an ama agus an spáis
result.html: Sháraigh siad laincisí an ama agus an spáisThey overcame the limitations of time and space.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ siad laincisí an ama agus an spáisThey overcame the limitations of time and space.

result.eng: We have lost too mich time.
result.ga: Tá an iomarca ama caillte againn
result.orig: Tá an iomarca ama caillte againn
result.html: Tá an iomarca ama caillte againnWe have lost too mich time.
result.ponchtml: Tá an iomarca ama caillte againnWe have lost too mich time.

result.html: Tá neart ama againnWe have plenty of time.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart ama againnWe have plenty of time.

result.eng: I need more time to examine the question properly.
result.ga: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceart
result.orig: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceart
result.html: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceartI need more time to examine the question properly.
result.ponchtml: Tá níos mó ama uaim ċun an ċeist a ċíoraḋ i gceartI need more time to examine the question properly.

result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ga: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.orig: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.html: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadhWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel is í an teilifís an ḟaḋb mar sin mura ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ an iomarca ama sa gciṫḟolcaḋWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!

result.html: Tá neart ama agaibhYou have plenty of time.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart ama agaiḃYou have plenty of time.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ga: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.orig: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.html: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an coinċeap é iriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġ aċ i ndeireaḋ ama caiṫfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
